name: Vienna Economic Forum
goal:
Popularising and promoting investment opportunities in the region from the Adriatic to the Black Sea.

Providing impulses and pointing out – on the basis of research – the joint projects required in the region for short-term, medium-term and long-term realisation, and promoting their implementation.

Becoming a place of definition, encounter, and of realising the public and private interests in
connection with the various projects in the region as part of the united Europe.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
1) Südosteuropa Zusammenarbeit (seit 10 Jahren)
2) Donau-Strategie
3) West-Balkan Meetings
4) Ost-Partnerschaft
